item.title: Get Intune Device Management Scripts Content using Graph
item.description: Device management scripts in Intune are custom scripts that can run on Windows 10 and higher clients and MacOS. The ability to run scripts on local devices gives you an alternative to configuring devices with settings that are not available under the configuration policies or in the apps part of Intune.
